comment: Its funny when you ask Riot staff a simple question and they think its funny to post a gif and then ignore you . Yet Riot want people to play there game . imagine how many more people would player LoL if Riot had staff who cared

# ::snt Its funny when you ask Riot staff a simple question and they think its funny to post a gif and then ignore you . Yet Riot want people to play there game . imagine how many more people would player LoL if Riot had staff who cared
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / funny
            :domain (a / and
                  :op1 (a2 / ask-01

                        :ARG2 (p / person
                              :ARG2-of (s2 / staff-01)))
                  :op2 (t / think-01

                        :ARG1 (f2 / funny
                              :domain (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (p2 / post-01
                                          :ARG0 p
                                          :ARG1 (g / gif))
                                    :op2 (ii / ignore-01

                                          :ARG1 y
                                          :time (t2 / then)))))))
      :snt2 (h / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 (c / company
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Riot"))
                  :ARG1 (p3 / play-01

                              :quant (a4 / amr-unknown)
                              :mod (m2 / more))
                        :ARG1 (g2 / game
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "LoL"))))
            :snt3 (ii2 / imagine-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (n3 / number
                        :quant-of (p5 / person
                              :ARG0-of (p6 / play-01
                                    :ARG1 g2)))
                  :condition (h2 / have-03
                        :ARG0 c

                              :ARG2-of (s3 / staff-01)
                              :ARG0-of (c2 / care-01))))))
